item.title: Badly uneven paving outside the Wellington Pub, 24th February
item.description:
The footpath in front of the entrance to the Wellington Pub and bus stop E has become extremely uneven causing a major tripping hazard - I rolled my ankle on the uneven section and an elderly person fell over due to how uneven it is - one paving slap seems to have slightly collapsed on one side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81 - 83, Waterloo Road, Waterloo, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Proposal for a new dedicated motorcycle-only parking bay on pembury place, 24th February
item.description:
I live in Pembury Circus within a free parking scheme, which means I am not eligible for a permit. I own a scooter, and there are three other motorcycles in the building. Currently, we do not have a suitable place to park our motorbikes. Parking bay needed

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pot hole in the middle of the road, 24th February
item.description:
Crack extends up the road; pot hole is very deep and risks extending further because of this. Causing damage to cars. Been there for a few months now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clive Road, Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic congestion caused by illegal parking..., 24th February
item.description:
Outside the special school on Wordsworth Road there is a smorgasbord of illegal waiting/parent cars/buses/delivery vans through which cyclists weave at speed every morning and afternoon. Double yellow lines everywhere! No enforcement?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wordsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foot Tunnel broken glass all over the floor in the tunnel, 24th February
item.description:
My kid went on a school trip today with 90 other children from a local school via the foot tunnel by prospect vale. The tunnel was filled with broken glass all over the floor, which was a major hazard for the school children and adults. Please arrange for the glass to be cleared ASAP and inspected on a regular basis.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Church Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New motorcycle bay, 24th February
item.description:
There is no dedicated motorcycle parking near our building on Atkins Square. The nearest bay is 500m away and shared with cars, always full. We request consideration for motorcycle-only parking bay on the dead-end section of the Pembury Place

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
